auth: fill this in your turntableUserAuth cookie
userid: fill this in from your turntableUserId cookie
roomid: fill this in from TURNTABLE_ROOMID in view-source:turntable.fm/$ROOM

messages.help: Welcome to {room.name}! I am a bot who understands commands and gives stats.  To view a list of commands, type *commands.
messages.newModerator: {user.name} is now a moderator in {room.name}.  With great power comes great responsibility.
